member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleAccess.CreateContentDecryptionModule
member.summary: Creates a that represents a Content Decryption Module (CDM) for a DRM key system.
member.param: An object containing the properties for the CDM.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleAccess.GetConfiguration
member.summary: Returns the supported combination of configuration options.
member.param: Receives a reference to an object containing the configuration options for the CDM.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleAccess.GetKeySystem
member.summary: Gets a string identifying the Key System being used by the Content Decryption Module (CDM).
member.param: Receives a pointer to an LPWSTR identifying the Key System.

member.name: IMFContentDecryptionModuleAccess
member.summary: Provides access to a media key system.
